amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for Energy Efficiency and Renewable Energy by $177,000,000 and reduce funding for Fossil Energy Research and Development by $355,000,000.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 38 printed in House Report 115-259 to increase funding for Energy Efficiency and Renewable Energy by $177,000,000 and reduce funding for Fossil Energy Research and Development by $355,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Castor (FL) amendment (A022) Failed by recorded vote: 181 - 246 (Roll no. 420).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Castor (FL) amendment (A022) Failed by recorded vote: 181 - 246 (Roll no. 420).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A022) offered by Ms. Castor (FL).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
